title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Positions in Southern Lebanon: Latest Updates and Insights”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF targeted Hezbollah positions in southern Lebanon; Hezbollah operatives identified operating in a military structure in southern Lebanon were attacked.

An IDF force from Unit 869 identified moments ago operatives working in a military facility of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the village area of Kila in southern Lebanon.
In a swift turnaround, Air Force fighter jets struck the structure where the operatives were located.

Additionally, fighter jets targeted another military structure of the organization in the Shihin area in southern Lebanon.

IDF forces carried out artillery fire throughout the day to remove threats towards the area of A-Nakura.

Earlier, several anti-tank missile launches were identified crossing from Lebanon towards the western Galilee; there were no casualties.

Attached is documentation of the attack in the Shihin area: https://bit.ly/3zjlIcx
